alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Grant; Kenton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN KENTON, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, SOUTHERN BOONE AND NORTHEASTERN GRANT COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Walton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Covington, Independence, Walton, Crittenden, Visalia, Atwood, Richwood, Bank Lick, Morning View, Bracht, White Villa, Fiskburg, Ricedale, Sherman, Verona, Piner, White Tower, and Latonia Lakes. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 72 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 162 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
